author: Aurélien
message: @chani: My guess is that Konq does not delete its setting dialog. If you open the dialog, go to some page, close it and open it again, you will notice the dialog opens on the page which was current when you closed it.

author: Fri13
message:
That scrollbar is good and bad (earlier version), bad thing was that user needed to scroll to see Cancel, Apply and OK. Good thing was user could get those buttons even with 1280x800 resolution screen what is pretty typical on laptops. Because that konqueror config panel is too big (height) to fit that size screen so it pushed space down but keeped window itself as it was and you needed only scroll down.

Yes, typical TFT screen size is 1280x1024 and bigger onces are coming but laptops has 1440x900, 1280x800 or even 1024x768 and for those screen sized, konqueror settings panel is just too big and would need much rework. At least java&javascript and plugins settings what automatically resize config window over screern size.
